names.pinyin: li qi huo xue zhang yao
names.english: order qi and invigorate and support the blood
names.commonEnglish: Order Qi and Invigorate and Support the Blood

actions: Invigorates the Blood, dispels Blood Stasis, regulates Qi flow, clears Heat and cools the Blood.
With Dang Gui, for tonifies the Blood and moves Qi.
Tonifies, invigorates and harmonizes the Blood, Reduces swelling and expels pus.
